content: this raglan sweater has a v-neck design that carries down the entire sweater it is designed to be customized to perfectly fit any body size and type from a small child to a 6xl since it is worked top down it can be tried on at any point of the process to ensure you get the perfect fit the hole at the end of the finger makes this sweater perfect to wear under a winter coat while the v down the front will make it figure flattering the sweater in the picture required 3 cakes of lion brand mandala in chimera and used a 5 00 mm hook there is not a gauge for this pattern so any yarn or hook size can be substituted this is not a row by row pattern but rather text instructions for each step i have also given my email address to make sure any questions or comments get directed to me you are free to sell any items made from this pattern you can even share the pattern i will likely end up making a row by row pattern so stay tuned if you need that type of pattern
